item.title: Feedback on Swiss IT Forum(s) 2024
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Feedback on the Digital Responsibility conferences I attended at Swiss IT forum(s) 2024, held on 26 and 27 September at Palexpo (Geneva)

item.title: Strategize
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Roman Pichler’s book Strategize details an extremely effective approach to digital product management.

item.title: Team topologies
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: The book Team topologies by Matthew Skelton and Manuel Pais details an approach based on the inversion of Conway’s Law to accelerate the value delivery of technology organisations.

item.title: GreenIT.fr association
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Green IT is the association that brings together the experts behind the digital sustainability, responsible digital, eco-design of digital services and slow.tech approaches.

item.title: Software environmental impact
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Software, although virtual, has a real environmental impact. The proliferation of bloatware is adding to the carbon footprint of digital technology. Software eco-design is the key to a more sustainable future.

item.title: Agile tour Lausanne 2022 - Who said we lacked energy?
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Lessons learned on the bottom-up approach implemented to initiate the transition from a project-oriented to a product-oriented organisation.

item.title: Agile tour Lyon 2022 - Towards endless euphoria
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Lessons learned on the creation of a product team within a company historically organised to carry out projects.

item.title: About me
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: Agile coach, digital product management specialist, fervent advocate of sustainable development.

item.title: Resume
item.author: vincent.loiseau@sustainablemind.tech (Vincent Loiseau)
item.description: My professional background is in digital software development, Agile coaching and sustainable development consulting.
